command.name: init
command.title: Workflow Init Command (/workflow:init)
command.description: Initialize project-level state with intelligent project analysis using cli-explore-agent

intent.primary_user_value: Initialize .workflow/project-tech.json (analysis) and .workflow/project-guidelines.json (rules scaffold) so other workflows and the CCW dashboard have project context.

must_not: Interrupt calling workflows after initialization completes (return immediately)
Claim implementation pointers are Existing without repo-verifiable evidence (docs heading + ccw/src anchor + Test-Path/rg verify)

p0: Frontmatter includes name, description, argument-hint, allowed-tools, group
Core sections present: Overview, Usage, Inputs, Outputs/Artifacts, Execution Process, Error Handling
Every implementation pointer row includes dual-source evidence (docs + ccw/src literal anchor) and a concrete Verify command; never label unverifiable pointers as Existing
